#Script to sum the occurrence of 'A','B','-','U' for scaffolds in a group.

== Summary ==

This python script sum the occurrence of 'A', 'B','-','U' for certain number of scaffolds per group 

== Details ==

=== Parameters ===
  * Input genotype file
  * number of scaffolds per group to sum

=== Sample Command ===
{{{
$ python 04-SumByColXu.py genotypes-test.tsv 100 

Scaffold1:6122
Scaffold2:243
Scaffold3:305
0.337430000305
 
}}}

=== Input and Output ===

  * Input file: -- genotype file: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/genotypes-test.tsv genotypes-test.tsv]

  * Output file: -- parsed file with SNP counts: [http://xuhu-rwm-map.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/data/sum_genotypes-test.tsv sum_genotypes-test.tsv]
